Verses: 1 avar Malaiyilirundhu Iranginapodhu, Thiralaana Janangal Avarukkup Pin Sendraargal.
2  Appozhudhu Kushtarogi Oruvan Vandhu Avaraip Panindhu: Aandavare! Umakkuch Chiththamaanaal, Ennaich Suththamaakka Ummaal Aagum Endraan.
3 yesu Thamadhu Kaiyai Neetti Avanaiththottu: Enakkuch Chiththamundu, Suththamaagu Endraar. Udane Kushtarogam Neengi Avan Suththamaanaan.

4  Yesu Avanai Nokki: Idhai Nee Oruvarukkum Sollaadhapadi Echcharikkaiyaayiru; Aayinum, Avargalukku Saatchiyaaga Nee Poi Aasaariyanukku Unnaik Kaanpiththu, Mose Kattalaiyitta Kaanikkaiyai Seluththu Endraar.
5 yesu Kapparnakoomil Piravesiththapodhu, Nootrukku Adhipadhi Oruvan Avaridaththil Vandhu:
6 aandavare! En Velaikkaaran Veettile Thimirvaadhamaaik Kidandhu Kodiya Vedhanaippadukiraan Endru Avarai Vendikkondaan.
7  Adharku Yesu: Naan Vandhu Avanai Sosthamaakkuven Endraar.
8  Nootrukku Adhipadhi Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Aandavare! Neer En Veettukkul Piravesikka Naan Paaththiran Alla; Oru Vaarththai Maaththiram Sollum, Appozhudhu En Velaikkaaran Sosthamaavaan.

9 naan Adhikaaraththukkuk Keezhppattavanaayirundhum, Enakkuk Keezhppattirukkira Sevakarumundu; Naan Oruvanaip Povendraal Pogiraan, Matroruvanai Vaavendraal Varugiraan, En Velaikkaaranai Idhai Sei Endraal Seykiraan Endraan.
10 yesu Idhaik Kettu Aachchariyappattu, Thamakkup Pin Sellugiravargalai Nokki: Isravelarukkullum Naan Ippadippatta Visuvaasaththaik Kaanavillai Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
11  Anegar Kizhakkilum Merkilumirundhu Vandhu, Paralokaraajyaththil Aapirakaam Eesaakku Yaakkopu Enpavarkalode Pandhiyiruppaargal.
12 raajyaththin Puththiraro Purampaana Irulile Thallappaduvaargal; Ange Azhukaiyum Parkadippum Undaayirukkumendru Ungalukku Sollukiren.
13 pinbu Yesu Nootrukku Adhipadhiyai Nokki: Nee Pogalaam, Nee Visuvaasiththapadiye Unakku Aagakkadavadhu Endraar. Andha Naazhikaiyile Avan Velaikkaaran Sosthamaanaan.
14 yesu Pedhuruvin Veettile Vandhu, Avan Maami Juramaaik Kidakkiradhaik Kandaar.
15 avar Aval Kaiyaith Thottavudane Juram Avalaivittu Neengitru; Aval Ezhundhirundhu Avargalukkup Panividai Seydhaal.
16  Asdhamanamaanapodhu, Pisaasu Pidiththirundha Anegarai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal; Avar Andha Aavigalaith Thamadhu Vaarththaiyinaale Thuraththi, Piniyaalikalellaaraiyum Sosthamaakkinaar:
17 avar Thaame Nammudaiya Pelaveenangalai Etrukkondu, Nammudaiya Noigalai Sumandhaar Endru, Esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyinaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
18 pinbu, Thiralaana Janangal Thammaich Choozhndhirukkiradhaik Kandu, Akkaraikkup Pogakkattalaiyittaar.
19 appozhudhu, Vedhapaaragan Oruvan Vandhu: Podhakare! Neer Enge Ponaalum Naan Ummaip Pinpatri Varuven Endraan.
20 adharku Yesu: Narikalukkuk Kuzhigalum Aagaayaththupparavaigalukkuk Koodukalum Undu; Manushakumaaranukko Thalaisaaikka Idamillai Endraar.
21 avarudaiya Seeshargalil Veroruvan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare! Munbu Naan Poi, En Thagappanai Adakkampanna Enakku Uththaravu Kodukkavendum Endraan.
22 adharku Yesu: Mariththor Thangal Mariththorai Adakkam Pannattum, Nee Ennaip Pinpatri Vaa Endraar.
23  Avar Padavil Erinapodhu Avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarukkup Pinsendru Erinaargal.
24 appozhudhu Padavu Alaigalinaal Mootappataththakkadhaaik Kadalil Perungaatru Undaayitru, Avaro Niththiraiyaayirundhaar.
25 appozhudhu, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Vandhu Avarai Ezhuppi: Aandavare! Engalai Ratchiyum, Madindhupogirom Endraargal.
26 adharku Avar: Arpavisuvaasigale! En Payappadugireergal Endru Solli; Ezhundhu, Kaatraiyum Kadalaiyum Adhattinaar. Udane, Migundha Amaidhalundaayitru.
27  Andha Manushargal Aachchariyappattu: Ivar Eppadippattavaro, Kaatrum Kadalum Ivarukkuk Keezhppadigiradhe Endraargal.

28 avar Akkaraiyile Kerkesenar Naattil Vandhapodhu, Pisaasu Pidiththirundha Iranduper Piredhakkallaraigalilirundhu Purappattu, Avarukku Edhiraaga Vandhaargal; Avargal Migavum Kodiyaraayirundhapadiyaal, Andha Vazhiyaaga Oruvanum Nadakkakkootaadhirundhadhu.
29 avargal Avarai Nokki: Yesuve, Thevanudaiya Kumaarane, Engalukkum Umakkum Enna? Kaalam Varumunne Engalai Vedhanaippaduththa Inge Vandheero Endru Kooppittaargal.
30  Avargalukkuk Konjadhooraththile Anegam Pandrigal Koottamaaga Meyndhukontirundhana.
31 appozhudhu, Pisaasugal: Neer Engalaith Thuraththuveeraanaal, Naangal Andhap Pandrikkoottaththil Pogumpati Uththaravu Kodum Endru Avarai Vendikkondana.
32 adharku Avar: Pongal Endraar. Avaigal Purappattu, Pandrikkoottaththil Poyina. Appozhudhu, Pandrik Koottamellaam Uyarndha Mettilirundhu Kadalile Paaindhu, Jalaththil Maandu Poyina.
33 avaigalai Meyththavargal Oti, Pattanaththil Sendru, Indhach Changadhigal Ellaavatraiyum, Pisaasu Pitiththirundhavargalukkuch Champaviththavaigalaiyum Ariviththaargal.
34 appozhudhu, Andhap Pattanaththaar Yaavarum Yesuvukku Edhirkontuvandhu, Avaraik Kandu, Thangal Ellaikalaivittup Pogumpadi Vendikkontaargal.
